definition: lit. to ascend to heaven/to die
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
day/sky/heaven

lit. poultry and dogs rise to Heaven (idiom)/fig. to ride on sb else's success/Once one man gets a government position, all his cronies get in too/Once sb has cracked the problem, every Tom, Dick and Harry can do it

lit. when a man achieves the Dao, his poultry and dogs rise to Heaven (idiom)/fig. to ride on sb else's success/Once one man gets a government position, all his cronies get in too/Once sb has cracked the problem, every Tom, Dick and Harry can do it
pinyin: yi1 ren2 de2 dao4 , ji1 quan3 sheng1 tian1

definition: Ascension Day (Christian festival forty days after Easter)
Assumption of the Virgin Mary (Christian festival on 15th August)

sentences.english: Jesus goes back to Heaven this event is called The Ascension.
sentences.chinese: 最後的宗教節日在耶穌升天節達到高潮。

sentences.english: The final fiesta climaxed on Ascension Day.
sentences.chinese: 最後的宗教節日在耶穌升天節達到高潮。

sentences.english: Close friends of the Mubarak government also prosper.
sentences.chinese: 穆巴拉克政府的朋友們也都雞犬升天了。

definition: to become immortal
(of a supernatural or divine being) to appear/to make itself manifest
to become immortal/big promotion/die
lit. to descend to earth (of an immortal)/to be born
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to be reincarnated
reincarnation or transmigration (Buddhism)
to descend to the world (of immortals)
virtuous achievements come to their successful conclusion (idiom)
to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
to be reborn/to recover/to come back to life/to regenerate
to die
to die/euphemism, lit. to return West or to the Western Paradise
paradise (mainly Buddhist)/Elysium/(Budd.) Sukhavati
Jesus (耶稣 is more usual)
